```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v6/go/aws/securityhub"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := securityhub.NewAccount(ctx, "test", nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		_, err = securityhub.GetStandardsControlAssociations(ctx, &securityhub.GetStandardsControlAssociationsArgs{
			SecurityControlId: "IAM.1",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#standardscontrolassociations_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">standards<wbr>Control<wbr>Associations</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#getstandardscontrolassociationsstandardscontrolassociation">List&lt;Property Map&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A list that provides the status and other details for each security control that applies to each enabled standard.
See <code>standards_control_associations</code> below.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Title of the standard.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="updatedat_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#updatedat_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">updated<wbr>At</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Last time that a control's enablement status in a specified standard was updated.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="updatedreason_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#updatedreason_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">updated<wbr>Reason</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Reason for updating a control's enablement status in a specified standard.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
